summary: Alice in Chains is an American rock band from Seattle, formed in 1987. They became famous in the 1990s with albums like *Facelift* and *Dirt*. The band's music combines grunge and heavy metal, featuring harmonized vocals. Original singer Layne Staley passed away in 2002, but the band continued with new members. They've released six studio albums and sold over 30 million records worldwide. Alice in Chains has been nominated for 11 Grammys and is considered one of the greatest hard rock artists by VH1.
title: Alice in Chains
